org.chocosolver.solver.constraints.real

Class IntEqRealConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chocosolver.solver.constraints.Constraint
      • org.chocosolver.solver.constraints.real.IntEqRealConstraint

  • public class IntEqRealConstraint
extends Constraint
    Channeling constraint between integers and reals, to avoid views
    Since:
    07/04/2014
    Author:
    Jean-Guillaume Fages

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntEqRealConstraint

        public IntEqRealConstraint(IntVar[] intVars,
                           RealVar[] realVars,
                           double epsilon)
        Channeling between integer variables intVars and real variables realVars. Thus, for any i in [0,intVars.length-1], |intVars[i]-realVars[i]|< epsilon. intVars.length must be equal to realVars.length.
        Parameters:
        intVars - integer variables
        realVars - real variables
        epsilon - precision parameter

      • IntEqRealConstraint

        public IntEqRealConstraint(IntVar intVar,
                           RealVar realVar,
                           double epsilon)
        Channeling between an integer variable intVar and a real variable realVar. Thus, |intVar-realVar|< epsilon.
        Parameters:
        intVar - integer variable
        realVar - real variable
        epsilon - precision parameter
